Union Territories of India

  1. Andman and Nicobr Islands
  2. Chandigarh
  3. Dadra and Nagar Haveli
  4. Daman and Diu
  5. Delhi
  6. Lakshadweep
  7. Punducherry

Union Territories and their Capital

Andman and Nicobr IslandsPort Blair
ChandigarhChandigarh
